name: Vestalife
overview:
Designed for Life Great products. That’s our goal â€“ and nothing less. We are passionate and devoted to creating products that inspire.

Our vision? To redefine customers’ lifestyles through innovative design and products that surprise and delight at every interaction.

We know design matters. That’s why our team includes celebrated and highly accomplished designers; people who have rocked the world of product design. Our team knows that great product design is about more than styling. It is about meeting our customers’ deeper needs to have products that easily integrate into their lifestyle. And it’s also about personal expression, surprise and delight. We deliver on all of these fronts by dedicating ourselves to understanding what consumers need, want and desire. We transform what we learn into something new, real and completely fresh. It’s all part of the Vestalife experience.

We’re a young company with a highly talented and experienced team of professionals who are all focused on one thing: bringing great design to build great products to deliver great consumer experiences.
